name: jsoncpp
comment: This package is dual licensed under MIT or Public-domain. To facilitate automatic use, a default license choice of MIT is denoted in the Acknowledgment section of the OSS and OSSelot disclosure documents. This shall not restrict the freedom of users to choose either MIT or Public-domain. In case you want to use the package under Public-domain you need to modify the license choice accordingly. Anyway, all license texts are provided.
